Hi Yify,

Love your work. have just joined. I dont feel right doing this as i know your busy but if there is any chance can i please make a request, i dont know how possible this is but can you please upload: Band Together For Canterbury? We had an earthquake here in Christchurch last year (and another on 22 Feb) and they put this benifit concert on its a long concert. I know tv team have it but i cant get it and its over 2gb :'( Please could you upload this? i understand if you cant and feel selfish for asking this. If you cant do it can you please let me know? Thank you so much yify, you dont know how much youve helped me through these hard times. Kia Kaha (be strong in Maori)
